General.Name: Tradetool Auto Co Ltd
General.Description: Tradetool Auto Co., Ltd. develops and sells automotive optics, metal stamping, and welding parts in Taiwan. The company offers automotive metal parts, such as metal parts stamping, metal component welding, and stamping die products. It also provides automotive optics parts, including display optical injection component; LED headlight lens and lens core; and head up displays (HUD) comprising HUD freeform mirror injection and coating, freeform mirrors, and combiners, as well as VR lens. The company was formerly known as Jeng Shiang Precision Ind. Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tradetool Auto Co., Ltd. in May 2016. Tradetool Auto Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
General.Address: Room 7, No.213 Chaofu Road, Taichung, Taiwan, 407
